mapper.sql: USER_ID /*사용자코드 */ , MENU_ID /*메뉴코드 */ , MENU_ODRG /*메뉴순번 */ , REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , AMD_DT /*수정일시 */
mapper.select: SELECT /*com.wigo.cmm.sys.dao.UserWdgtDao.selectListCount*/ COUNT(1) FROM TB_SYS_USER_WDGT_BAS A , TB_SYS_MENU_BAS B

SELECT /*com.wigo.cmm.sys.dao.UserWdgtDao.selectList*/ A.USER_ID /*사용자코드 */ , A.MENU_ID /*메뉴코드 */ , A.MENU_ODRG /*메뉴순번 */ , A.REGR_ID /*등록자ID */ , A.REG_DT /*등록일시 */ , A.AMDR_ID /*수정자ID */ , A.AMD_DT /*수정일시 */ , B.MENU_NM , B.MENU_URL FROM TB_SYS_USER_WDGT_BAS A , TB_SYS_MENU_BAS B
ORDER BY A.MENU_ODRG , B.MENU_NM

SELECT /*com.wigo.cmm.sys.dao.UserWdgtDao.selectCustType*/ A.* , DECODE(CNT_TOTAL,0,0,ROUND(100*CNT_001/CNT_TOTAL)) AVG_001 , DECODE(CNT_TOTAL,0,0,ROUND(100*CNT_002/CNT_TOTAL)) AVG_002 , DECODE(CNT_TOTAL,0,0,ROUND(100*CNT_003/CNT_TOTAL)) AVG_003 , DECODE(CNT_TOTAL,0,0,ROUND(100*CNT_004/CNT_TOTAL)) AVG_004 , DECODE(CNT_TOTAL,0,0,ROUND(100*CNT_005/CNT_TOTAL)) AVG_005 , DECODE(CNT_TOTAL,0,0,ROUND(100*CNT_006/CNT_TOTAL)) AVG_006 , DECODE(CNT_TOTAL,0,0,ROUND(100*CNT_007/CNT_TOTAL)) AVG_007 , DECODE(CNT_TOTAL,0,0,ROUND(100*CNT_008/CNT_TOTAL)) AVG_008 , DECODE(CNT_TOTAL,0,0,ROUND(100*CNT_009/CNT_TOTAL)) AVG_009 FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) CNT_TOTAL , COUNT(DECODE(IFNULL(CUST_TYPE_CD,'001'),'001',1,NULL) ) CNT_001 , COUNT(DECODE(CUST_TYPE_CD,'002',1,NULL) ) CNT_002 , COUNT(DECODE(CUST_TYPE_CD,'003',1,NULL) ) CNT_003 , COUNT(DECODE(CUST_TYPE_CD,'004',1,NULL) ) CNT_004 , COUNT(DECODE(CUST_TYPE_CD,'005',1,NULL) ) CNT_005 , COUNT(DECODE(CUST_TYPE_CD,'006',1,NULL) ) CNT_006 , COUNT(DECODE(CUST_TYPE_CD,'007',1,NULL) ) CNT_007 , COUNT(DECODE(CUST_TYPE_CD,'008',1,NULL) ) CNT_008 , COUNT(DECODE(CUST_TYPE_CD,'009',1,NULL) ) CNT_009 FROM TB_SYS_CUST_BAS WHERE CUST_STATUS_CD != '003' ) A

SELECT /*com.wigo.cmm.sys.dao.UserWdgtDao.selectCustTypeList*/ A.COMN_CD CUST_TYPE_CD , A.COMN_CD_NM CUST_TYPE_CD_NM , IFNULL(B.CNT,0) CNT FROM TB_SYS_COMN_CD_BAS A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(1) CNT , IFNULL(CUST_TYPE_CD,'001') CUST_TYPE_CD FROM TB_SYS_CUST_BAS A WHERE CUST_STATUS_CD != '003' GROUP BY IFNULL(CUST_TYPE_CD,'001') ) B ON A.COMN_CD = CUST_TYPE_CD WHERE A.TOP_COMN_CD = 'CU030' AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2 ORDER BY A.COMN_CD_ODRG

SELECT /*com.wigo.cmm.sys.dao.UserWdgtDao.selectCouponList*/ A.USE_DT , IFNULL(B.USE_CNT,0) USE_CNT , IFNULL(C.REG_CNT,0) PUB_CNT FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(current_timestamp()-8 + LEVEL,'%Y%m%d') USE_DT FROM DUAL CONNECT BY 8 > LEVEL) A , ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS USE_CNT , SUBSTR(USE_DT,1,8) USE_DT FROM TB_SYS_COUPN_PBLS_HST WHERE USE_DT BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(current_timestamp()-7,'%Y%m%d')|| '000000' AND DATE_FORMAT(current_timestamp(),'%Y%m%d')|| '000000' AND COUPN_TYPE_CD NOT IN ('013') GROUP BY SUBSTR(USE_DT,1,8)) B , ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS REG_CNT , DATE_FORMAT(TRUNC(REG_DT),'%Y%m%d') USE_DT FROM TB_SYS_COUPN_PBLS_HST WHERE REG_DT BETWEEN TRUNC(current_timestamp()-7) AND TRUNC(current_timestamp()) AND COUPN_TYPE_CD NOT IN ('013') GROUP BY TRUNC(REG_DT)) C WHERE A.USE_DT = B.USE_DT(+) AND A.USE_DT = C.USE_DT(+) ORDER BY A.USE_DT

SELECT /*com.wigo.cmm.sys.dao.UserWdgtDao.selectMembershipRegList*/ A.REG_DT , IFNULL(B.REG_CNT,0) REG_CNT , IFNULL(C.PREV_REG_CNT,0) PREV_REG_CNT FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(current_timestamp()-8 + LEVEL,'%Y%m%d') REG_DT FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL < 8) A , ( SELECT COUNT(1) REG_CNT , DATE_FORMAT(TRUNC(MSHIP_SBSC_DT),'%Y%m%d') REG_DT FROM TB_SYS_CUST_BAS WHERE MSHIP_SBSC_YN = 'Y' AND MSHIP_SBSC_DT BETWEEN TRUNC(current_timestamp()-7) AND TRUNC(current_timestamp()) GROUP BY TRUNC(MSHIP_SBSC_DT)) B , ( SELECT COUNT(1) PREV_REG_CNT , DATE_FORMAT(TRUNC(MSHIP_SBSC_DT)+7,'%Y%m%d') PREV_REG_DT FROM TB_SYS_CUST_BAS WHERE MSHIP_SBSC_YN = 'Y' AND MSHIP_SBSC_DT BETWEEN TRUNC(current_timestamp()-7-7) AND TRUNC(current_timestamp()-7) GROUP BY TRUNC(MSHIP_SBSC_DT)) C WHERE A.REG_DT = B.REG_DT(+) AND A.REG_DT = C.PREV_REG_DT(+) ORDER BY A.REG_DT

SELECT /*com.wigo.cmm.sys.dao.UserWdgtDao.selectCustRegList*/ A.* FROM ( SELECT A.CHL_CD , A.COMN_CD_NM CHL_CD_NM , A.COMN_CD_ODRG , A.COLOR_CD , IFNULL(B.REG_CNT,0) REG_CNT , IFNULL(C.PREV_REG_CNT,0) PREV_REG_CNT FROM ( SELECT COMN_CD CHL_CD , COMN_CD_NM , COMN_CD_ODRG , RFRN_1_COMN_CD COLOR_CD FROM TB_SYS_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'S000' AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2 AND COMN_CD_1_USE_YN = 'Y' ) A , ( SELECT COUNT(1) REG_CNT , REG_CHL_CD CHL_CD FROM TB_SYS_CUST_BAS WHERE REG_DT BETWEEN TRUNC(current_timestamp()-7) AND TRUNC(current_timestamp()) GROUP BY REG_CHL_CD) B , ( SELECT COUNT(1) PREV_REG_CNT , REG_CHL_CD CHL_CD FROM TB_SYS_CUST_BAS WHERE REG_DT BETWEEN TRUNC(current_timestamp()-7-7) AND TRUNC(current_timestamp()-7) GROUP BY REG_CHL_CD ) C WHERE A.CHL_CD = B.CHL_CD(+) AND A.CHL_CD = C.CHL_CD(+) ) A ORDER BY REG_CNT DESC,PREV_REG_CNT DESC,COMN_CD_ODRG

SELECT /*com.wigo.cmm.sys.dao.UserWdgtDao.selectOrdList*/ A.ORD_DE , IFNULL(B.ORD_CNT,0) ORD_CNT , IFNULL(C.PREV_ORD_CNT,0) PREV_ORD_CNT FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(current_timestamp()-8 + LEVEL,'%Y%m%d') ORD_DE FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL < 8) A , (SELECT COUNT(1) ORD_CNT , ORD_DE FROM TB_SYS_CUST_BOS_CNTRT_HST WHERE ORD_DE BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(current_timestamp()-7,'%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(current_timestamp()-1,'%Y%m%d') AND ITEM_TY_CD IN ( '1100', '2100', '2200', '9500', '9700') AND SALE_TY_CD != '1202' AND ORD_STS_CD != '99' GROUP BY ORD_DE) B , (SELECT COUNT(1) PREV_ORD_CNT , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(ORD_DE,'%Y%m%d') + 7 ,'%Y%m%d') ORD_DE FROM TB_SYS_CUST_BOS_CNTRT_HST WHERE ORD_DE BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(current_timestamp()-7-7,'%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(current_timestamp()-1-7,'%Y%m%d') AND ITEM_TY_CD IN ( '1100', '2100', '2200', '9500', '9700') AND SALE_TY_CD != '1202' AND ORD_STS_CD != '99' GROUP BY ORD_DE) C WHERE A.ORD_DE = B.ORD_DE(+) AND A.ORD_DE = C.ORD_DE(+) ORDER BY A.ORD_DE
SELECT /*com.wigo.cmm.sys.dao.UserWdgtDao.selectCustCountInfo*/ COUNT(1) CUST_CNT , COUNT(DECODE(MSHIP_SBSC_YN,'Y',1,NULL)) MSHIP_CNT FROM TB_SYS_CUST_BAS WHERE CUST_STATUS_CD != '003'

SELECT /*com.wigo.cmm.sys.dao.UserWdgtDao.selectCustCountWeek*/ SUM(B.REG_CNT) THIS_WEEK_CNT , SUM(C.PREV_REG_CNT) LAST_WEEK_CNT FROM ( SELECT COMN_CD CHL_CD , COMN_CD_NM FROM TB_SYS_COMN_CD_BAS WHERE TOP_COMN_CD = 'S000' AND COMN_CD_LVL_NO = 2 AND COMN_CD_1_USE_YN = 'Y' ) A , ( SELECT COUNT(1) REG_CNT , REG_CHL_CD CHL_CD FROM TB_SYS_CUST_BAS WHERE REG_DT BETWEEN TRUNC(current_timestamp()-7) AND TRUNC(current_timestamp()) GROUP BY REG_CHL_CD) B , ( SELECT COUNT(1) PREV_REG_CNT , REG_CHL_CD CHL_CD FROM TB_SYS_CUST_BAS WHERE REG_DT BETWEEN TRUNC(current_timestamp()-7-7) AND TRUNC(current_timestamp()-7) GROUP BY REG_CHL_CD ) C WHERE A.CHL_CD = B.CHL_CD(+) AND A.CHL_CD = C.CHL_CD(+)
mapper.insert: /*com.wigo.cmm.sys.dao.UserWdgtDao.insertUserCard*/ INSERT INTO TB_SYS_CARD_PBLS_HST ( CARD_PBLS_HST_SEQ, ITG_CUST_NO, CARD_BAS_NO, CARD_TYPE_CD, CARD_DIV_CD, MSHP_NM, MPHON_NO, MSHIP_GRADE_CD, USE_YN, AMDR_ID, AMD_DT, REGR_ID, REG_DT, REG_CHL_CD ) SELECT FN_CRM_AUTO_SEQ('CRD') , A.ITG_CUST_NO , FN_LUHN_CARD('') , '001' , '001' , A.CUST_NM , A.MPHON_NO , '002' , 'Y' , A.AMDR_ID , A.AMD_DT , A.REGR_ID , A.REG_DT , A.REG_CHL_CD FROM TB_SYS_CUST_BAS A WHERE ITG_CUST_NO NOT IN ( SELECT ITG_CUST_NO FROM TB_SYS_CARD_PBLS_HST )
